input.sentences: this summer you should take a trip to your city 's local garden .
gardens are beautiful gifts to a town that make for a great way to spend an afternoon .
you never know what you will see as you travel along the path deeper into the garden .
a great variety of plants are found inside these gardens ; it can be fun to try to learn them .
sometimes you will see an old building like this one covered in vines .
output.sentences: I went on a summer trip and it was somewhat local.
I went into town to spend money on gifts.
I examined the view on the travel path to the garden.
There is a large variety of plants to learn about.
There were many vines that covered the building.
